vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Rut.1.2; married to Elimelech (H0458);
mother of: Mahlon (H4248) and Chilion (H3630); also called Mara at Rut.1.20;
Another name of no.o.mi (נׇעֳמִי "Naomi" H5281)
§ Mara = "bitterness"
a name that Naomi called herself due to her calamities
vocabInfos._es_Definition: otro nombre para Noemí, esposa de Elimélec
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪拉 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "苦味"
拿俄米為自己所命的名字源自於她的不幸 #得 1:20|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛拉 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "苦味"
拿俄米为自己所命的名字源自于她的不幸 #得 1:20|
